updatestrategy

Interface IUpdateStrategy<TDispMsg>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BlackholeStrategy, BreathingStrategy, BrownStrategy, ColorStrategy, CurveStrategy, DrunkenStrategy, ElasticStrategy, MultiUpdateStrategy, PoliceStrategy, SpawnStrategy, SpeedingStrategy, StarStrategy, StraightStrategy, SwitcherStrategy, TeleportOnCollideStrategy, WanderStrategy, WormholeStrategy

    public interface IUpdateStrategy<TDispMsg>
    Interface for update strategy

    • Method Detail

      • init

        void init(Ball context)
        Initializes the strategy. Should be called every time the ball sets a new strategy.
        Parameters:
        context - The ball that is using this strategy

      • updateState

        void updateState(Ball context,
                 IDispatcher<TDispMsg> dispatcher)
        The method to update states of the ball
        Parameters:
        context - the ball using this method for update
        dispatcher - dispatcher to send the command
